name: which-key
description: Display available keybindings in a panel

failedTimeout.description: How long the panel showing a failed keystroke will be shown

isVisible.description: Show the key bindings guide at the bottom of the workspace

enum.description: Atom style: CTRL-w, ALT-b, BACKSPACE, RIGHT
Emacs style: C-w, M-b, BACKSPACE, RIGHT

keystrokesFormat.description: Format for the keystrokes regarding individual and modifier keys
